- 优化了App 页面导航机制，全面提升应用稳定性。
- 提高了 App 启动速度，并且也可以在启动页选择语言。
- 加强了对导入无效私钥的校验

- 优化了App 页面导航机制，全面提升应用稳定性。
- 提高了 App 启动速度，并且也可以在启动页选择语言。
- 加强了对导入无效私钥的校验

- Brand-new Help Center! More concise pages, faster loading speed, better user experience!
- A more reasonable instant exchange rate! The mechanism of acquiring Kyber protocol exchange rate was adjusted to reduce the error gap of the exchange rate.

- Brand-new Help Center! More concise pages, faster loading speed, better user experience!
- A more reasonable instant exchange rate! The mechanism of acquiring Kyber protocol exchange rate was adjusted to reduce the error gap of the exchange rate.

- A more reasonable instant exchange rate! The mechanism of acquiring Kyber protocol exchange rate was adjusted to reduce the error gap of the exchange rate.

- Improve the page of EOS resource management. imToken provides the function of urgent CPU rent, You can temporarily lend resources to others, and choose to redeem them.
- imToken has already opened DApp Browser for EOS DApp, to support the EOS DApp e

- Improve the page of EOS resource management. imToken provides the function of urgent CPU rent, You can temporarily lend resources to others, and choose to redeem them.
- imToken has already opened DApp Browser for EOS DApp, to support the EOS DApp e

- Added full support to the Internet domain name resolution for .xyz and .luxe. In imToken, users can use domain names which ending in .xyz and .luxe as wallet addresses to transfer money. Isn't it amazing? Experience it!
- Upgraded EOS token manageme

- Added full support to the Internet domain name resolution for .xyz and .luxe. In imToken, users can use domain names which ending in .xyz and .luxe as wallet addresses to transfer money. Isn't it amazing? Experience it!
- Upgraded EOS token manageme

- Support for migration to imToken 2.0 from imToken 1.0 with one-click.
- Support for backup later. More convenient to experience imToken 2.0 features, but still remember to backup.
- Optimize version upgrade reminder.

- Support for migration to imToken 2.0 from imToken 1.0 with one-click.
- Support for backup later. More convenient to experience imToken 2.0 features, but still remember to backup.
- Optimize version upgrade reminder.

For users：
- Revamped ’Browser’. Added new sections including ‘Recommended’ DApps and clear DApp categorisation for you;
- Supported Simple Wallet Protocol, simply scan QR codes to access and login into EOS DApps;
- Optimized DApp bro

For users：
- Revamped ’Browser’. Added new sections including ‘Recommended’ DApps and clear DApp categorisation for you;
- Supported Simple Wallet Protocol, simply scan QR codes to access and login into EOS DApps;
- Optimized DApp bro

- Optimize transaction status processing, improve transaction success rate
- Optimize Tokenlon authorization and error messages
- Fix flash crash issue for some smartphone models

- Improved miner fee hints
- Smoother DApp browser search
- More optimization and improvements

- Optimized Tokenlon trading experience
- imKey optimization: BTC transfers more smoothly, enhanced UTXO processing capacity
- More user-friendly address book
- Clearer DApp browser disclaimer & address authorization
- More optimization a

- imKey supports COSMOS blockchain & BTC-native USDT
- BTC Miner Fees are optimized for lower consumption
- Performance optimizations

imToken introduces a long-awaited feature: Biometrics verification!
You can now use your biometrics like fingerprint instead of passwords to execute transactions or use DApps.

Other updates:

- Add "recommended token" categor

Cheers to a new year and see you in 2020 :)

- New chains supported: NERVOS、TRON、BCH、LTC
- Support .crypto domain, using Unstoppable Domains to get your first domain

Cheers to a new year and see you in 2020 :)

- New chains supported: NERVOS、TRON、BCH、LTC
- Support .crypto domain, using Unstoppable Domains to get your first domain

Version 2.6.0 supports new chains Polkadot and Kusama!

You can use imToken to manage Polkadot and Kusama wallets, experience many functions such as transfer, claim DOTs and staking

Note: Polkadot's transfer function is waiting for its main n
